definition: a restraint used to slow or stop a vehicle, to cause to stop by applying the brakes
details:
noun
- a restraint used to slow or stop a vehicle
- anything that slows or hinders a process
= example: anything that slows or hinders a process
- an area thickly overgrown usually with one kind of plant
- large coarse fern often several feet high
= synonyms: bracken, pasture brake
- any of various ferns of the genus Pteris having pinnately compound leaves and including several popular houseplants
verb
- to cause to stop by applying the brakes
= example: to cause to stop by applying the brakes
- to stop travelling by applying a brake
= example: to stop travelling by applying a brake
